title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies: Self-Reflection-Based Mathematics Instruction for Early Learning Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their mathematics teaching competencies three or more times using self-assessment tools within six months and establish improvement plans
Learners achieve over 80% in peer evaluations for their ability to design differentiated mathematics lessons considering learner comprehension levels
Learners can analyze five or more case studies of effective mathematics pedagogy in digital environments and propose improvements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
